item.title: Simple Router
item.description:
Simple Router

Wi-Fi routers suck. They're universally ugly and hard to use. But Eero's little internet pods are the opposite of that standard. While they may not be the very best in terms of performance, the Eero system fixes a lot of big problems that plague the wifi genre.

item.title: Vivoactive HR wearable
item.description:
Vivoactive HR wearable

On Friday Garmin announced their new Vivoactive HR & Vivofit 3. As you'll remember, my post was rather short and pretty limited in terms of content (just one pic!). I promised that come around Sunday, I'd get some hands-on time with the units and then post back on my thoughts.
